title: Kasula Kempu Studs - Timeless Elegance in Bloom
materials: Brilliant Cut Cubic Zirconia (CZ) stones. Finished with our signature Hyderabadi polish for a lasting luster.
features: These stunning studs feature a stylized kasula (coin) design, reinterpreted for the modern woman. The flower-like silhouette is meticulously crafted in 22K gold and embellished with sparkling CZ stones. The openwork gold frame adds a delicate touch. A contemporary take on a classic motif.
occasions: or as a thoughtful gift for weddings
or anniversaries. Perfect for the modern woman who appreciates a touch of tradition.
description: A timeless design blending traditional Kasula motifs with modern aesthetics. The high-quality gold and brilliant CZ stones ensure lasting beauty and value. Lightweight and comfortable for daily wear. Makes a perfect gift symbolizing prosperity and good fortune.
